newsitem.title: FINLAND: Metsa-Serla sees smaller cyclical impact.
newsitem.headline: Metsa-Serla sees smaller cyclical impact.

text.p: Finnish forestry group Metsa-Serla Oy said on Tuesday a deal with UPM-Kymmene would reduce its financial exposure to cyclical fluctuations by concentrating chemical pulp production.
The companies said earlier that their jointly owned pulp mill Metsa-Botnia would take over Metsa-Serla's Aanekoski pulp business and UPM-Kymmene's Joutseno pulp mill.

"The fact that all chemical pulp operations are to be channelled through Metsa-Botnia will dampen the impact of cyclical fluctuations on the group's financial results," Metsa-Serla said in a statement.
